mapper.update:
update iel_stock
entry_id = #{entryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customs_clearance = #{customsClearance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parts_no = #{partsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parts_name = #{partsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parts_en_name = #{partsEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sales_price = #{salesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repertory = #{repertory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = now(),
ship_num=#{shipNum},
buy_contract_no = #{buyContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
engine_no = #{engineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xx_no = #{xxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_category_id = #{typeCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
model_alias=#{modelAlias},
configuration=#{configuration},
status=#{status},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update iel_stock set entry_id = #{entryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customs_clearance = #{customsClearance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parts_no = #{partsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parts_name = #{partsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parts_en_name = #{partsEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales_price = #{salesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repertory = #{repertory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = now(), ship_num=#{shipNum}, buy_contract_no = #{buyContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine_no = #{engineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xx_no = #{xxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR} configuration = #{configuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR} status = #{status} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from iel_stock
and entry_id = #{entryId}
and status=0
mapper.insert:
insert into iel_stock ( entry_id, customs_clearance, destination, parts_no, parts_name, parts_en_name, unit, quantity, sales_price, device_type, repertory, position, create_time, update_time, ship_num,buy_contract_no, model, sn, engine_no, xx_no, brand,type_category_id,model_alias,configuration,status ) values
(#{item.entryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.customsClearance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.partsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.partsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.partsEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.salesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.repertory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(),now(),#{item.shipNum}, #{item.buyContractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.engineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.typeCategoryId},#{item.modelAlias},#{item.configuration},#{item.status} )
mapper.select:
select
from iel_stock where status = 0
and entry_id like concat('%',#{stock.entryId},'%')
and customs_clearance like concat('%',#{stock.customsClearance},'%')
and destination like concat('%',#{stock.destination},'%')
and parts_no like concat('%',#{stock.partsNo},'%')
and parts_name like concat('%',#{stock.partsName},'%')
and parts_en_name like concat('%',#{stock.partsEnName},'%')
and unit like concat('%',#{stock.unit},'%')
and quantity like concat('%',#{stock.quantity},'%')
and sales_price like concat('%',#{stock.salesPrice},'%')
and device_type like concat('%',#{stock.salesPrice},'%')
and repertory like concat('%',#{stock.salesPrice},'%')
and position = #{stock.position,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ship_num like concat('%',#{stock.shipNum},'%')
and buy_contract_no like concat('%',#{stock.buyContractNo},'%')
and model like concat('%',#{stock.model},'%')
and sn like concat('%',#{stock.sn},'%')
and engine_no like concat('%',#{stock.engineNo},'%')
and xx_no like concat('%',#{stock.xxNo},'%')
and brand like concat('%',#{stock.brand},'%')
and type_category_id like concat('%',#{stock.typeCategoryId},'%')
and model_alias like concat('%',#{stock.modelAlias},'%')
and configuration like concat('%',#{stock.configuration},'%')
